summary: The maniacal baby of the Griffin family, Stewie, meets his future self. In doing this he discovers that his future image is not what he has anticipated because of a near death experience.
cast: Seth MacFarlane|Alex Borstein|Seth Green|Mila Kunis|Lori Alan|Drew Barrymore|Noel Blanc|John G. Brennan|Mike Henry|Gary Janetti|Don LaFontaine|Phil LaMarr|Ron Livingston|Rachael MacFarlane|Kevin Michael Richardson|Kate Rigg|Will Sasso|André Sogliuzzo|Rory Charles Thost|John Viener|Adam West|Wally Wingert|Rene Auberjonois|Ralph Garman|Jennie Garth|Larry Kenney|Lynne Lipton|Jason Priestley|Chris Sheridan|Danny Smith|Tori Spelling|Fred Tatasciore|Adam Borstein|Joy Behar|Michael Clarke Duncan|Bill Fagerbakke|David A. Goodman|Ali Hillis|Busy Philipps|Patrick Warburton|Audrey Wasilewski|Tom Nabler
title: Stewie Griffin: The Untold Story
